Destinate

A travel application built on the backend

Features

- Built with node.JS with Express and EJS

- RESTful routing

- Authentication and Authorisation using passport and express session

- User details, posts and comments stored in a MongoDB database

- Flash alerts

View Repo View Project

Memory Cards

Play this fun memory card game

Features

- Functionallity built with JavaScript

- Timer and move counter to analyze performance

- Variables to track card selections and game status

- Built using parcel and transpiled with babel

- SCSS

View Repo View Project

Github User Finder

Find any GitHub user with this search tool

Features

- Search for a user and first match will be displayed

- Users latest five repositiory's are displayed

- Search triggers an HTTP request to the GitHub API

- HTTP request made using Fetch

View Repo View Project

Movie Collection

Search for any title using this movie collection application

Features

- User can search for any movie title

- First twenty matches are displayed

- HTTP request using fetch to the movieDB API

- Second HTTP request using id to fetch specific movie

- Add movies to wishlist or collection

- Wishlist and collection items persisted to local storage

View Repo View Project

Furnish

A beautiful website for a fictional furnishing company

Features

- Single page scrollable website built using SCSS

- Fully responsive

- CSS animations

- Custom grid system

View Repo View Project

Meal Finder

Inspire the inner chef in you with this meal finder application

Features

- User can search for meals by ingredient

- List of meals are displayed in UI

- Bootstrap

- HTTP request to the mealDB API using fetch

- Second HTTP request using id to fetch specific meal details

View Repo View Project

Shopping List

Keep track of all your shopping needs

Features

- User can add and remove items from their list

- Items are persisted to local storage

- User can filter items

- Bootstrap
